backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles with access control, profile CRUD, and location updates restricted by permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing OTP login changes for India (+91) number normalization and related touched files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files including hooks, pages, components, styles, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light/dark theme color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with protected routes, layout handling, and navigation logic based on auth and OTP state.
frontend/src/components/LocationStatusCa: UI card showing location permission status, coordinates, and controls for requesting or refreshing location.
frontend/src/components/MobileAppShell.t: Authenticated mobile layout with header, logout, main content outlet, and bottom navigation for shop/customer views.
frontend/src/components/OtpLoginCard.tsx: Renders a two-step phone and OTP login UI with validation, simulated backend calls, and success callback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocationPermission: Requests browser geolocation permission, retrieves coordinates, and tracks permission status and loading/error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useOtpSession.ts: Manages OTP verification state and stored phone number in localStorage with helpers to set and clear the session.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistLastKnownLo: Sends the user's latest coordinates to the backend when available and reports mutation status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls for user profile and location data using React Query, including save and update mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode palette, and custom utilities including scrollbars and mobile-friendly defaults.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Displays the customer home feed with location status, search UI, categories, and placeholder sections for nearby shops and upcoming features.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page handling Internet Identity and OTP authentication, redirecting users to role selection once both are verified. Shows loaders, login buttons, and an OTP card.
frontend/src/pages/RoleSelectionPage.tsx: Lets authenticated OTP users select a role and saves it to their profile, redirecting based on existing or chosen role. Includes loading states and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/ShopDashboardPage.tsx: Static shop dashboard showing location status, quick actions, basic stats, and upcoming features for shop owners.
frontend/src/utils/phoneNumber.ts: Provides validation, normalization, and display formatting utilities for Indian phone numbers in +91 E.164 format.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL query parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, fonts, and enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
